name: search_memes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool humor_jokes_and_memes.
Tool description: Humor API lets you search through 50,000 jokes, over 200,000 memes, and gifs. From Chuck Norris, over Knock Knock to Yo Mama jokes, you'll find something for every occasion.
API description: Search for memes.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Search-Memes for more.

media_type.description: The type of content to search for. Can be 'image', 'video', or specific formats such as 'jpg', 'png', 'gif', or 'mp4'. Defaults to 'image'.

keywords_in_image.description: Whether the keywords should be found in the meme's image. Defaults to None.

keywords.description: A comma-separated list of keywords to search for. Defaults to 'rocket'.

min_rating.description: The minimum rating the results should have, between 0 and 10. Defaults to 3.

number.description: The number of results to retrieve, between 1 and 10. Defaults to 3.
